long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our powerful task manager Chrome extension is designed to keep you productive and organized with ease.

With a built-in timer, you can set specific time limits for each task, helping you stay focused and on schedule. Whether youâ€™re tackling work projects, studying, or working on personal goals, this tool ensures you stay in check, eliminating distractions and encouraging deep focus.

Key Features:

Task List Management: Write down key tasks in an easy to use form 

Built-in Timer: Set a timer for each task to manage your time more effectively and stay on track.

Reminders & Notifications: Get notified as your timer completes
